label.description: An accessible label for the `<Modal />` content

children.description: Recommended children types are: `Modal.Header`, `Modal.Body`, `Modal.Footer`. Custom children can be used as well. `Variant` and `overflow` properties are always passed down to children.

as.description: The element to render the dialog as, `span` by default

variant.description: Designates the background style of the `<Modal />`

open.description: Whether or not the `<Modal />` is open

defaultFocusElement.description: An element or a function returning an element to focus by default

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| Node
| Window
| ReactElement
| Component
| (() => Node | Window | null | undefined)
| null

shouldReturnFocus.description: Whether focus should be returned to the trigger when the `<Modal/>` is closed

shouldCloseOnDocumentClick.description: Whether the `<Modal/>` should request close when the document is clicked

onOpen.description: Callback fired when `<Modal />` content has been mounted in the DOM

onClose.description: Callback fired when `<Modal />` has been unmounted from the DOM

onDismiss.description: Callback fired when the `<Modal />` is requesting to be closed

tsType.name: signature
tsType.raw:
(
  event: React.UIEvent | React.FocusEvent,
  documentClick?: boolean
) => void

contentRef.description: A function that returns a reference to the content element

mountNode.description:
An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node
for the `<Modal />` (defaults to `document.body`)

insertAt.description: Insert the element at the 'top' of the mountNode or at the 'bottom'

liveRegion.description:
An element, function returning an element, or array of elements that will not be hidden from
the screen reader when the `<Modal />` is open

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| (() => (Element | null)[])
| (() => Element | null)
| (Element | null)[]
| Element
| null

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the <Modal /> transitions in

onEntering.description: Callback fired as the <Modal /> begins to transition in

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the <Modal /> finishes transitioning in

onExit.description: Callback fired right before the <Modal /> transitions out

onExiting.description: Callback fired as the <Modal /> begins to transition out

onExited.description: Callback fired after the <Modal /> finishes transitioning out

constrain.description: Constrain the Modal to the document window or its closest positioned parent

overflow.description:
Should ModalBody handle overflow with scrollbars, or fit its
content within its own height?
